components.name: Application Gateway
components.description: Acts as a reverse proxy, directing user traffic to the appropriate services.

components.name: Web App
components.description: Core application logic that processes user requests.

components.name: Azure SQL Database
components.description: Managed database service for storing application data.

components.name: Web App Firewall
components.description: Filters and monitors HTTP traffic to and from the web application for security.

components.name: Application Insights
components.description: Monitors application performance and usage metrics.

data_flows.description: User requests are routed through the Application Gateway for traffic management.
The Application Gateway directs traffic to the Web App for processing user requests.
The Web App retrieves and stores data in the Azure SQL Database.
The Web App sends performance and usage data to Application Insights for monitoring.

trust_boundaries.name: User Interaction Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between end-users and the application components.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Storage Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between application logic and data storage.
